poem:
Title: "Through the Courtroom's Looking Glass"

The deft twist of the narrative, Colbert incites,
With the don pulling strings through an insomniac night.
Oh, the circus of justice adorned with its jesters,
And all of us watching - reluctant spectators.
The gavel speaks truth while the verdict unwinds,
In this land of the lawless, where truth is defined.
